     Jun 1, 2018 
 
     Karnalyte Reminds Shareholders of Deadline to Vote at AGM 
 
     KARNALYTE REMINDS SHAREHOLDERS OF DEADLINE TO VOTE AT AGM  Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States.  – Vote now for a focus on future value creation – Proxy voting deadline is 9:30 a.m. (Saskatoon time) on Tuesday, June 5, 2018  SASKATOON, SK (CNW: June 1, 2018) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or “the ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     May 29, 2018 
 
     Karnalyte Welcomes Support From Largest Shareholder as Momentum Builds Behind Management Slate and Resolutions at AGM 
 
     KARNALYTE WELCOMES SUPPORT FROM LARGEST SHAREHOLDER AS MOMENTUM BUILDS BEHIND MANAGEMENT SLATE AND RESOLUTIONS AT AGM  Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States.  Shareholders urged to vote FOR all management director nominees and resolutions prior to the proxy voting deadline of 9:30 a.m. (Saskatoon time) on Tuesday, June 5, 2018  SASKATOON, SK (CNW ...      Karnalyte Resources Inc. Issues Letter to Shareholders Warning of Threats to Value Creation From Self-Interested Individuals
